backend.database

Class ImageDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.database.ImageDAO

  • @Entity
public class ImageDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates ImageDAO objects that represent the images being added to the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageDAO()
      Constructor without parameters according to NetBeans standard
      ImageDAO(UserDAO userDAO, java.lang.String path, int fileSize, int date, int imageHeight, int imageWidth, double latitude, double longitude)
      Generates a new ImageDAO object to be saved in the database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageDAO

        public ImageDAO(UserDAO userDAO,
                java.lang.String path,
                int fileSize,
                int date,
                int imageHeight,
                int imageWidth,
                double latitude,
                double longitude)
        Generates a new ImageDAO object to be saved in the database.
        Parameters:
        userDAO - The user this image is saved to
        path - path to where the image is saved
        fileSize - file size
        date - creation date
        imageHeight - height in pixels
        imageWidth - width in pixels
        latitude - geographical latitude (if it has one)
        longitude - geographical longitude (if it has one)

      • ImageDAO

        public ImageDAO()
        Constructor without parameters according to NetBeans standard
